entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
